lead_paragraph: Former Los Angeles Lakers head coach Byron Scott says he thought he had more time to right the ship before the team fired him last week.

headline.print_headline: Former Lakers Coach Byron Scott 'Shocked' Over Firing
headline.main: Former Lakers Coach Byron Scott 'Shocked' Over Firing

snippet: Former Los Angeles Lakers head coach Byron Scott says he thought he had more time to right the ship before the team fired him last week....
